full_text:
CHARGES.

	(a)	There is hereby imposed a Base Charge of $23.00 per Equivalent Dwelling Unit on each parcel for the receiving, transporting, pumping, treatment and/or disposal of storm drainage through the storm drain system, said Base Charge being effective beginning July 1, 1993.  (Amended by Ord. No. 168,980, Eff. 9/12/93.)

	(b)	The Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge (SPAC) for each parcel shall be calculated by applying the following formula:

SPAC = Base Charge × EDU

	The parcel run-off factor shall be determined according to Section 64.51.05 of this article.

2.catch_line: Land Use Categories And Run-Off Factors.

next_section.catch_line: Land Use Categories And Run-Off Factors.

plain_text:
LOS ANGELES MUNICIPAL CODE

CHARGES. (§ 64.51.03)

  CHARGES.	(a)	There is hereby imposed a Base Charge of $23.00 per Equivalent
Dwelling Unit on each parcel for the receiving, transporting, pumping, treatment
and/or disposal of storm drainage through the storm drain system, said Base
Charge being effective beginning July 1, 1993.  (Amended by Ord. No. 168,980,
Eff. 9/12/93.)	(b)	The Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge (SPAC) for each
parcel shall be calculated by applying the following formula:SPAC = Base Charge
× EDU	The parcel run-off factor shall be determined according to Section
64.51.05 of this article.

CHARGES.

(a) There is hereby imposed a Base Charge of $23.00 per Equivalent Dwelling Unit on each parcel for the receiving, transporting, pumping, treatment and/or disposal of storm drainage through the storm drain system, said Base Charge being effective beginning July 1, 1993.  (Amended by Ord. No. 168,980, Eff. 9/12/93.)

(b) The Stormwater Pollution Abatement Charge (SPAC) for each parcel shall be calculated by applying the following formula:

SPAC = Base Charge × EDU

The parcel run-off factor shall be determined according to Section 64.51.05 of this article.
